pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel

Class GridPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • pt.ipleiria.estg.dei.gridpanel.GridPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class GridPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Represents a grid of a configurable number of lines and columns, where each cell can contain a visual representation. * @author mpmf
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • clear

        public void clear(int row,
         int column)
        Removes a CellRepresentation from the GridPanel
        Parameters:
        row - the row where the CellRepresentation is to be removed from
        column - the column where the CellRepresentation is to be removed from

      • remove

        public void remove(CellRepresentation cell)
        Removes the given CellRepresentation from the grid. If the CellRepresentation is used for more than one cell, it is removed from all the cells
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell to be removed

      • putOverlay

        public void putOverlay(int row,
              int column,
              CellRepresentation cell)
        Places a CellRepresentation in a GridPanel cell as an overlay. While there is normally one CellRepresentation per cell, this method makes it possible to place several CellRepresentations in a cell, by overlaying them on top of each other.
        Parameters:
        row - the row where to place the overlayed CellRepresentation
        column - the column where to place the overlayed CellRepresentation
        cell - the CellRepresentation to overlay

                              int column,

                 int column)
        Removes all of the overlayed CellRepresentation from a cell
        Parameters:

        column - the column of the cell

      • removeOverlay

        public void removeOverlay(int row,
                 int column,
                 CellRepresentation cell)
        Removes a specified overlayed CellRepresentation from a cell
        Parameters:
        row - the row of the cell
        column - the column of the cell
        cell - the overlayed CellRepresentation to remove

      • clearAll

        public void clearAll()
        Removes all of the CellRepresentations from the GridPanel (including the overlayed ones).

      • moveItem

        public void moveItem(int fromRow,
            int fromColumn,
            int toRow,
            int toColumn,
            int speed)
        Moves a CellRepresentation from an origin cell to a destination cell, animating the movement for a given time
        Parameters:
        fromRow - the origin cell line
        fromColumn - the origin cell column
        toRow - the destination cell line
        toColumn - the destination cell column
        speed - the time taken in the movement animation

      • hasPath

        public boolean hasPath(int fromRow,
              int fromColumn,
              int toRow,
              int toColumn)
        Verifies if there is a possible path between an origin cell and a destination cell. For a path to exist, there must be a contiguous sequence of empty cells starting in the origin cell (which may not be empty) to the destination cell (which must be empty).
        Parameters:
        fromRow - the origin cell line
        fromColumn - the origin cell column
        toRow - the destination cell line
        toColumn - the destination cell column
        Returns:
        whether there is a path or not between the cells

      • setGridBackground

        public void setGridBackground(java.awt.Color color)
        Defines the grid area background color
        Parameters:
        color - the new grid background color. If null, the color returns to the default Color.DARK_GREY
        See Also:
        setGridBackground(String)

      • setGridBackground

        public void setGridBackground(java.lang.String imagePath)
        Defines the grid area background image. This image will be stretched to fill the grid area. Any transparent area in the image will be filled with the grid background color.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - the path to the image filename.
        See Also:
        setGridBackground(Color)
